text:
@NYGovCuomo They should install COVID-19 filtering A/C’s. Thanks. 
While your at it MAKE IT MANDATORY THAT RESTAURANTS INSTALL SOUNDPROOF CEILINGS FOR RESTURANTS AND BARS BELOW APARTMENTS OR RESIDENCES for noise pollution coming from these businesses. Thank You, Governor.
